name: Colony Wars III: Red Sun
description:
The Vengeance Wars are raging at the far reaches of the galaxy, as you embark on the most dangerous adventure yet. A personal struggle - far greater than the Navy versus the League. A battle that will decide the fate of Mankind itself...

路 Up close dogfight action with 50 selectable free-form space and planet -based missions.

路 Discover 4 new vast, solar systems featuring space stations, end of level guardians, alien life-forms and more.

路 Upgrade from a choice of 9 player ships, each customisable with over 30 weapons, cloaking devices and bolt-ons.

路 Save between missions as you progress through the epic saga to the final showdown.
